5.1. SteelScript NetProfilerÂ¶

All interaction with a NetProfiler requires an instance of NetProfiler This class establishes a connection to the NetProfiler. There are dedicated class for each different type of report.

Documentation available in this module:

  • Profiler Columns and Groupbys
